options: ['Tell the teacher our Chinese names.', 'Find English names for ourselves.', 'See an English film.', 'Draw pictures.']
questions: What do we do in the first English class?
article: I will never forget my first English class. It is very interesting. It's the first class in the morning. The teacher goes into the classroom with a smile on his face. At the beginning, he makes a self-introduction . And he tells us that his English name is John. Then he asks all of us to think of English names for ourselves. We are very excited  to find a good name. Then he asks us to write our names down on a piece of paper. I think about my English name for a long time. Then I come up with  a beautiful name ---Shirley. All the students write their names down and give the paper to the teacher. When the teacher calls "Shirley" to answer his question, three girls stand up at the same time.
